CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(Name,6) = "NTD : ", RIGHT( Name , LEN( Name)- 5 ), IF (OR ("NTD: "= LEFT(Name, 5 ),"NTD :" = LEFT(Name, 5 )), RIGHT( Name , LEN( Name)- 5 ), IF (OR("NTD:" = LEFT(Name,4),"NTD " = LEFT(Name,4)), RIGHT (Name, LEN (Name)-4), IF (LEFT (Name,3)= "NTD", RIGHT (Name,LEN (Name)-3), Name ))))
CustomField.label: NTD Labor Code
